name: Lakeridge Golf Course
description: Lakeridge Golf Course is truly Reno’s Must See; Must Play Golf Course. Number 15, a par 3, features a tee shot from a hillside tee box 140 feet above the water to a true island! From the championship tee, this shot is 239 yards but plays about 195 yards to the middle of the green without wind. In windy conditions care must be taken at both the tee and the green. Lower and closer tees also are available without sacrificing the outstanding view of the city.

Signature Championship Course
Home to the famous
15th Island Hole
overlooking Lake Stanley, plus a full 18-hole championship layout.

Lakeridge Golf Course is built for groups — from 8 to 100 players. We arrange consecutive tee times, rooming lists, and comps for organizers. Whether it’s a buddies trip, corporate outing, or charity tournament, our team handles the details so you can focus on the game.

Lakeridge Golf Course is an exceptional blend of challenges, aesthetics, strategy, and fun. Designed by Robert Trent Jones, Sr., Lakeridge Golf Course has been voted “Best of Reno” in consecutive years past, Best Golf Course of Northern Nevada by Nevada Magazine, and the famous 15th hole has been featured as one of the top 18 par 3s in the western United States in Fairways and Greens Magazine.

pointOfView: Lakeridge is a favorite and an absolute must play as part of your Reno golf getaway. It's playable for all skill levels, has a great restaurant and overall great service, and its maturity and views are unique to other area golf courses. It's minutes from all downtown and outlying Reno hotels and casinos. The 15 th hole is quite possibly one of the most awe-inspiring golf holes that you'll ever play!

featuredHole.title: Hole #15 — Par 3 (Island Green)
featuredHole.description: Reno's most iconic hole. A floating island green surrounded by water on all sides. Pick your club, commit to your line, and swing. There's no bail-out — it's all carry. The most photographed hole in Northern Nevada.

testimonials.quote: Played Lakeridge Golf Course with our group and it was incredible. The Robert Trent Jones Jr. design keeps you thinking on every shot. Easily one of the best courses in Reno, NV.
testimonials.author: Amy M.

testimonials.quote: Booked Lakeridge Golf Course as part of a 3-course package with Golf the High Sierra. This was the standout round. Great elevation changes, strategic bunkering, and the staff couldn't have been more welcoming to our group of 20.
testimonials.author: Tina E.

testimonials.quote: We've done golf trips all over the West, and Lakeridge Golf Course is now a permanent stop. The condition was pristine, greens rolled true, and the mountain views are unmatched. GTHS set up our tee times perfectly.
testimonials.author: Dan G.
